title-group.article-title: On the Iwasawa λ-Invariant of the Cyclotomic ${\Bbb Z}_2$ -Extension Of $Q(\sqrt p )$

abstract.p: We study the Iwasawa λ-invariant of the cyclotomic ${\Bbb Z}_2$ -extension of $Q(\sqrt p )$ for an odd prime number p which satisfies p ≡ 1 (mod 16) relating it to units having certain properties. We give an upper bound of λ and show λ = 0 in certain cases. We also give new numerical examples of λ = 0.
